mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_qna(qnaNum, subject, content, qnaType, productNum, userId,create_date, enabled) VALUES(QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subject},#{content},#{qnaType},#{productNum}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT subject, content, qnaType, userId,create_date, enabled FROM product_qna WHERE productNum = #{productNum} ORDER BY qnaNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT subject, content, qnaType, userId,create_date, enabled, b.productName, b.productNum, qnaNum FROM product_qna q LEFT OUTER JOIN product_bbs b ON q.productNum =b.productNum WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY qnaNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE product_qna SET subject =#{subject}, qnaType=#{qnaType}, content=#{content} WHERE qnaNum= #{qnaNum}
